mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.`name`, m.`code`, m.url, m.type, m.icon, m.sort, m.remark, m.create_date, m.update_date FROM sys_user u JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON r.id = rm.role_id JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.sort
